::Scavenger::

"Allright," Scavenger replies, using the scanners to lock onto the Hidden One and keep track of it after he sits down in the ship.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Apeface, Quake, Nightmare and Jagged all arrive, land and transform,
> just behind Slugslinger, Dreadwing and Darkwing. They all transform, and
> to Havotrons furious screams, enter the ship. Hook looks around, "All
> right Constructicons, let's go, and show the Autobots what this ships
> got." as he leaps down, into the ship, followed by the rest. SLugslinger
> stands beside Soundwave, "Dosent this remind you off the good ol days?,
> back to roaring around the Universe. Before we lost the war." 
> 
> Apeface pushes Slugslinger as he climbs on, then pounds his chest, "Yes,
> we go to hunt." he yelled. Nightmare carried Jagged to the CR chambers. 
> 
> Hook walked to the other constructicons, "So, let's show em what this
> babies got." He says, sitting down at the helm of the ship, in the
> navagational area. Scrapper sits beside him, at the guidance system. He
> begins to bark out orders. "Mixmaster, activate the cloaking device.
> Scavanger, use our radar system to keep a bead on the hidden one,
> Bonecrusher, Lonhaul, get those weapon systems ready, to blow them outta
> the sky." he says with dry emotion.
> 
> Havotron sits in the throne. "Soundwave, block all radio transmissions,
> so we arent detected, and happy hunting boys." 
> 
> All Spinister did, was walk over to a window, and contemplativly look
> down at the ground, as the rockets burst to life, sending flames licking
> the launch pad with raw heat. He watched Cybertron become smaller, until
> it was gone. He whispered something, but nobody could make it out.
